answers.answer: My doctor says I'm overweight/obese. But before I got pregnant my pediatric doctor said I'm a perfect weight for my height. But anyway I was 178 before I got pregnant now I'm 188 and suppose to be gaining 4 pounds every month. I'm 25 weeks 4 days
And my pregnancy has been going good so far!

Yea, I'm considered overweight/obese & this pregnancy has by far been worse than when I was 100lbs smaller with my 1st. I've been borderline diabetic & I have carpal tunnel  (don't know if it's weight related though). Was due on the 4th & I have been extremely uncomfortable & cranky.

I was over weight w my first I was 145 and when I had him I was 215 I was induced at 39wks and I had no complications  .. Dr didn't say anything that preg but this preg I have gestational diabetes and my endocrinologist makes comments about me being over weight iv gained 50 lbs this preg and I'm 33wks iv been at 200lbs for 4 wks and no issues because of my weight So far hopefully I make it through this time w out issues but I'm not so sure
is it ok to try to maintain and not gain too much weight during pregnancy if you were overweight before? I read if you're overweight you don't have to gain as much weight.
I'm overweight but my pregnancy has been going good. Before my pregnancy started I had good bp and I still do now, no gestational diabetes or anything this far. 28 weeks

question: Anybody here pregnant and overweight? How did the pregnancy go? Any complications? Any risk?
title: overweight
